lom:description.lom:string: This site provides java applets for students to explore bezier curves, 2D transformation operations, ligting models, and 3D viewing operations. Keywords: bezier curves, transformations, lighting model, computer graphics, computing methods

lom:title.lom:string: Applets for teaching computer graphics concepts
